text: Inn per her jagah zillat ki maar pari illa yeh kay Allah Taalaa ki ya logon ki panah mein hon yeh ghazab-e-elahee kay mustahiq hogaye aur inn per faqeeri daal di gaee yeh iss liye kay yeh log Allah Taalaa ki aayaton say kufur kertay thay aur bey waja anbiya ko qatal kiya kertay thay yeh badla hai inn ki na farmaniyon aur ziyadtiyon ka
